Articles.Content: Well... they're eventually coming. If you want them now, just download KW Rocketry or NovaPunch.

Well... they're eventually coming. If you want them now, just download KW Rocketry or NovaPunch.

Do we actually have words from the devs on that?

3.75m parts would be interesting. I think we'd see a whole new generation of heavy lift designs come out of it. I also think that there should NEVER be 5m designs. Cool as NP is, I think that's just too big. ANd yes, what are the actual devs' words on 3.75m parts?
Doesn't this fall under the category of just a "more parts" suggestion?

I've been desperately wanting 3.75m and 5m ranges of parts but they would need to redo the part menu as its getting cluttered as it is.

Making a replica Saturn V using the 2.5m capsule takes hundreds of parts currently when with larger tanks it could be reduced to 100 or so.

I get the feeling we may have to wait for tweakables before we get this, if we ever see them.

In the what not to suggest list, just next to New parts there is **

** this means no general 'more parts' threads. If you have specific ideas feel free to post them.

Make sure you read the stikies before posting, and try to have more content and "meat" within your suggestion. As of forum rule 2.3.a says, you are not allowed to post message that lack any substantial content.
